EMGPlacementSchemeDescription: Grids placed on dorsal and volar aspects of the forearm, approximately 3 cm from elbow and 2 cm from ulna. See channels.tsv and electrodes.tsv for details.
EMGReference: placed on the skin over the ulnar styloid process (wrist)
TaskDescription: Subject performed isometric finger press tasks with multiple combinations of fingers.
Instructions: Maintain a steady force on the transducer to match the target force level shown on the screen.
